messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] I AM NEW!!
messages.msgSnippet: Carroll, I live in Ohio (Cincinnati) but my brother lives in Florida.  We have 3 boys (8,5.5, and 3) and one girl (almost 2).  I would love to continue to get
messages.messageBody:
Carroll,

I live in Ohio (Cincinnati) but my brother lives in Florida. We have 3 boys (8,5.5, and 3) and one girl (almost 2). I would love to continue to get to know you and everyone else. If we drive to Florida sometime, maybe we can detour and go through the Carolinas. I am also in my thirties and a stay-at-home mom. I help my husband with his business occassionally, but I am actually resigning from my "paid" position there at the end of this month.

We love to travel, build and create anything out of everything, watch movies, play outside, and do things as a family. If you ever want to email me off-line, feel free in order to get to know each other better.

hmschleidt@...

You will find this group very committed to helping people find their way. I have been learning so much about really loving life with my children and hubby!

Off to California for 5 days! Later!

Heather



To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.comFrom: carrollcroom916@...: Sat, 14 Feb 2009 23:11:07 -0500Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] I AM NEW!!



I am so sorry everyone that I did not list my location. I just didn't even think. I am in Elgin, Sc and looking to meet other moms in the area.. I am also looking forward to talking and getting to know those moms that don't live so close to me. Thanks so much for the warm welcome from everyone.Carroll-----Original Message-----From: Jet Lakey <Jetlakey@...>To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.comSent: Sat, 14 Feb 2009 8:00 pmSubject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] I AM NEW!!Congrats on what's going to be a great adventure! BTW where do you live (city/state)? I have a 6yr old boy we live in Harpers Ferry, wv.Jet Lakey -live simply so others may simply live-To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.comFrom: carrollcroom916@...: Fri, 13 Feb 2009 03:44:44 +0000Subject: [unschoolingbasics] I AM NEW!!Hello everyone. I am TOTALLY NEW to homeschooling/unschooling. Infact, I just withdrew my children from public school today. I am 30and a stay at home mom, I am a professional photographer and makechildren's hairbows, I have a daughter who is 9 and 2 boys, they are 6and 7. I am looking to make some new friends for my children and Ialong with LEARNING how to navigate this new experiance. I hope totalk and meet some of you out there soon.Carroll__________________________________________________________Windows Live�: Keep your life in sync. http://windowslive.com/howitworks?ocid=TXT_TAGLM_WL_t1_allup_howitworks_022009[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]------------------------------------Yahoo! messages.subject: Re: I AM NEW!!
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome to the list Caroll!  This is a great place to start gaining some insight about unschooling.  While your IRL (in real life) community of unschoolers
messages.messageBody:
Welcome to the list Caroll! This is a great place to start gaining
some insight about unschooling. While your IRL (in real life)
community of unschoolers grows, you might find that virtually
connecting with tribe online is as powerful a contribution to your need
for connection with like minds as evolves your IRL connections.

Enjoy the ride!

cindy

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "carrollharrison"
<carrollcroom916@...> wrote:
>

>
> Carroll

To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com

Sent: Thursday, February 12, 2009 10:44 PM

Subject: [unschoolingbasics] I AM NEW!!



Hello everyone. I am TOTALLY NEW to homeschooling/unschooling. In

fact, I just withdrew my children from public school today. I am 30

and a stay at home mom, I am a professional photographer and make

children's hairbows, I have a daughter who is 9 and 2 boys, they are 6

and 7. I am looking to make some new friends for my children and I

along with LEARNING how to navigate this new experiance. I hope to

talk and meet some of you out there soon.



Carroll

messages.subject: Re: I AM NEW!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Carroll, I am really new too, about 3 weeks of homeschooling and just learning about unschooling.  I have 2 sons ages 8 and 16, but I am only homeschooling
messages.messageBody:
Hi Carroll,

I am really new too, about 3 weeks of homeschooling and just learning
about unschooling. I have 2 sons ages 8 and 16, but I am only
homeschooling my 8 year old. I am a parttime medical transcriptionist
working from home. Nice to meet you :)
